location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 2800/43 'Persia. Sanction to Lease of Lands + Buildings at Dustak'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 9; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of memoranda from the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf regarding the sanction to lease lands and buildings at Dustak [Dastak, Iran].
